message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this fantastic product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking to save, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,500.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save more. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I understand you're trying to save more, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $10,000. I'm willing to make a slight concession and sell the product to you for $10,200.
I understand your position, Alice, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $9,900 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I'm starting to get concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,100.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $9,700 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure it's worth it. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,050.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
